programme.title: Last Seen Alive
programme.desc: Will Spann is driving his soon-to-be ex-wife Lisa to her parents' home when she mysteriously disappears without a trace during a stop at a gas station. A frantic Will engages the local police and Lisa's parents in a desperate attempt to find her, but as time passes and suspicion falls on him, he must take matters into his own hands, delving into the town's criminal underbelly while running from the authorities in a race against time. Thriller, with Gerard Butler and Jaimie Alexander Brian Goodman - Director, Brian Goodman - Director Gerard Butler - Will Spann Jaimie Alexander - Lisa Spann Russell Hornsby - Detective Paterson Aleks Alifirenko Jr - Paranoids Gerard Butler - Will Spann Jaimie Alexander - Lisa Spann Russell Hornsby - Detective Paterson Aleks Alifirenko Jr - Paranoids.

programme.title: SAS: Red Notice
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Sam Heughan and Ruby Rose. Mercenaries led by the cold-blooded Grace Lewis attack a train in the Channel Tunnel and hold the passengers hostage. programme.title: Shaun the Sheep Movie
programme.sub-title: Family, Drama, Animation, Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Children's ║ 2015 ║ U
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure from Aardman. Shaun's plan to have a lazy day on Mossy Bottom Farm backfires when a cunning ruse sees the Farmer end up lost in the Big City. Shaun and the flock set off to find him, but to succeed they will have to avoid capture by an eager animal control officer, with nothing but elaborate disguises and quick wits Mark Burton (2) - Director, Richard Starzak - Director, Mark Burton (2) - Director, Richard Starzak - Director Justin Fletcher - Shaun / Timmy John Sparkes - The Farmer / Bitzer Omid Djalili - Trumper Richard Webber - Shirley Kate Harbour - Timmy's Mum / Meryl Tim Hands - Slip Nick Park - Nick Park Stanley Unwin - Bus station and hospital announcer Andy Nyman - Nuts Simon Greenhall - Twins Emma Tate - Hazel Justin Fletcher - Shaun / Timmy John Sparkes - The Farmer / Bitzer Omid Djalili - Trumper Richard Webber - Shirley Kate Harbour - Timmy's Mum / Meryl Tim Hands - Slip Nick Park - Nick Park Stanley Unwin - Bus station and hospital announcer Andy Nyman - Nuts Simon Greenhall - Twins Emma Tate - Hazel.

programme.title: A Shaun the Sheep Movie: Farmageddon
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Drama, Animation, Documentary And Factual, News And Current Affairs, Family, Fantasy, Sci Fi, Children's
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure from Aardman, featuring the voices of Justin Fletcher and John Sparkes. Life at Mossy Bottom Farm takes a surprising turn when an alien crash-lands nearby. The extraterrestrial visitor is friendly enough, but when it transpires that a government agent is on its trail, Shaun the Sheep and friends come up with a plan to help the newcomer get back home Will Becher - Director, Richard Phelan - Director, Will Becher - Director, Richard Phelan - Director Justin Fletcher - Shaun / Timmy John Sparkes - The Farmer / Bitzer Amalia Vitale - Lu-La Justin Fletcher - Shaun / Timmy John Sparkes - The Farmer / Bitzer Amalia Vitale - Lu-La.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs the World
programme.desc: Action comedy from the director of Shaun of the Dead, starring Michael Cera and Mary Elizabeth Winstead. Despite having a high-school girlfriend, wannabe rock star Scott Pilgrim can't help falling for the woman of his dreams, the enigmatic Ramona Flowers. programme.title: Catch Me If You Can
programme.sub-title: Documentary And Factual, Drama, Crime/detective, Comedy ║ 2002 ║ 12
programme.desc: Comedy drama, based on the true story of conman Frank Abagnale Jr, starring Leonardo DiCaprio and Tom Hanks. Shattered by the news that his parents are divorcing, 16-year-old Frank runs away to New York. For six years he lives a life of fraud, cashing over $2 million in bad cheques while impersonating an airline pilot, a paediatrician and a lawyer, and always staying one step ahead of tenacious FBI agent Carl Hanratty Steven Spielberg - Director, Steven Spielberg - Director Leonardo DiCaprio - Frank William Abagnale Jr / Frank Taylor / Frank Conners / Barry Allen Tom Hanks - Carl Hanratty Christopher Walken - Frank William Abagnale Sr Martin Sheen - Roger Strong Nathalie Baye - Paula Abagnale Amy Adams - Brenda Strong James Brolin - Jack Barnes Brian Howe - Tom Fox Jennifer Garner - Cheryl Ann Ellen Pompeo - Marci Elizabeth Banks (2) - Lucy Frank W Abagnale - French policeman Leonardo DiCaprio - Frank William Abagnale Jr / Frank Taylor / Frank Conners / Barry Allen Tom Hanks - Carl Hanratty Christopher Walken - Frank William Abagnale Sr Martin Sheen - Roger Strong Nathalie Baye - Paula Abagnale Amy Adams - Brenda Strong James Brolin - Jack Barnes Brian Howe - Tom Fox Jennifer Garner - Cheryl Ann Ellen Pompeo - Marci Elizabeth Banks (2) - Lucy Frank W Abagnale - French policeman.

programme.title: Gran Torino
programme.desc: Drama starring Clint Eastwood. Retired car-assembly worker, widower, Korean War veteran and all-round curmudgeon Walt Kowalski is thrown into conflict with his Hmong neighbours after one of the teenage sons tries to steal his prize 1972 Ford Gran Torino as part of a gang initiation rite Clint Eastwood - Director, Clint Eastwood - Director Clint Eastwood - Walt Kowalski Bee Vang - Thao Ahney Her - Sue Christopher Carley - Father Janovich Brian Haley - Mitch Kowalski Geraldine Hughes - Karen Kowalski Brian Howe - Steve Kowalski Dreama Walker - Ashley Kowalski William Hill - Tim Kennedy John Carroll Lynch - Barber Martin Brooke Chia Thao - Vu Chee Thao - Grandma Clint Eastwood - Walt Kowalski Bee Vang - Thao Ahney Her - Sue Christopher Carley - Father Janovich Brian Haley - Mitch Kowalski Geraldine Hughes - Karen Kowalski Brian Howe - Steve Kowalski Dreama Walker - Ashley Kowalski William Hill - Tim Kennedy John Carroll Lynch - Barber Martin Brooke Chia Thao - Vu Chee Thao - Grandma.

programme.title: The Cinema List: The 90s

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Will Smith, Charlize Theron and Jason Bateman. The life of superhero John Hancock is on the skids; despite having saved countless lives, he's mostly remembered now for destroying property while flying around drunk. But after he rescues PR executive Ray Embrey from the path of a train, Hancock is offered the chance of repairing his tarnished image Peter Berg - Director, Peter Berg - Director Will Smith - John Hancock Charlize Theron - Mary Embrey Jason Bateman - Ray Embrey Eddie Marsan - Red Johnny Galecki - Jeremy Will Smith - John Hancock Charlize Theron - Mary Embrey Jason Bateman - Ray Embrey Eddie Marsan - Red Johnny Galecki - Jeremy.

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: Following the death of Superman, intelligence officer Amanda Waller convinces Washington DC officials to let her assemble Task Force X, a team of lethal criminals. programme.desc: Oscar-winning historical drama starring Colin Firth, Helena Bonham Carter and Geoffrey Rush. programme.title: The Colour Room
programme.desc: Period drama telling the story of Clarice Cliff, who broke the glass ceiling and helped revolutionise the workplace in the 20th century. Clarice is a vivacious young factory worker in the industrial British midlands of the 1920s. Bursting with ideas for colours and shapes, she takes more and more dangerous risks, but manages to stay one step ahead of the workhouse and impress eccentric factory owner Colley Shorter with her talent and innovation. programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. But when the book suddenly becomes a surprise hit in Mexico, his publicist insists he travel there on a promotional tour. Upon arrival, a confused Henry discovers the reason behind the popularity - Mexican translator Maria has rewritten the dull book as a steamy erotic story. A furious Henry and reluctant Maria must now travel together on a book tour across Mexico. As tempers flair and sparks fly, the two begin to find love. Romantic comedy, starring Sam Claflin and Veronica Echegui Robert Shaye - Director, Robert Shaye - Director.

programme.desc: During the final weeks of the most consequential presidential election campaign in US history, America is poised to elect either its first female president or finally break the country's two-party gridlock with its first viable independent candidate. programme.desc: During the final weeks of the most consequential presidential election campaign in US history, America is poised to elect either its first female president or finally break the country's two-party gridlock with its first viable independent candidate. Eli is pursuing a story about budget cuts and by following the money, she and Booker uncover a financial conspiracy that places the fate of the election, the country, and democracy in their hands. programme.title: The Exorcist: Believer
programme.desc: Single parent Victor Fielding raises his daughter Angela, 13 years after the death of his pregnant wife in a Haitian earthquake. He is alarmed when Angela and her friend Katherine vanish in the woods and return three days later with no memory of their ordeal. A shocking chain of events convinces Victor that his daughter's soul is at stake and he calls upon Chris MacNeil to help him confront an ancient evil. programme.title: Taare Zameen Par
programme.desc: The film was praised and won several awards including, 'Best Film, Best Director, Best Story, Best Playback Singer (Male), Best Lyrics, Best Supporting Actor, Best Child Actor'.

programme.title: King Uncle
programme.desc: When a runaway orphan ends up at the house of a cruel millionaire, she decides to alter his perception of the world.

programme.title: Chameli Ki Shaadi
programme.desc: (1986) A hilarious movie about a small town romance. Starring Anil Kapoor, Amrita Singh, Amjad Khan, Annu Kapoor and Pankaj Kapoor. Directed by Basu Chatterjee. Music by Kalyanji Anandji.

programme.title: Pyar Jhukta Nahin
programme.desc: (1985) Ajay (Mithun Chakraborty) and Preeti (Padmini Kolhapure) get married but interference from her rich father separates them. Will he be able to keep them apart for long?

programme.title: Yamla Pagla Deewana
programme.desc: (Movie @6) Paramvir Singh arrives in India in search of his estranged father and brother and faces many hilarious challenges.

programme.title: Akhanda
programme.desc: To save the saviour Murali Krishna from an evil Varadarajulu's trap, Lord Shiva's ardent devotee, Akhanda, moves heaven and earth.

programme.title: Ab Tumhare Hawale Watan Sathiyo
programme.desc: (2004) Kunal (Bobby) is in love with Shweta, who's waiting for her husband Rajeev (Akshay) to return from war. Kunal is torn between his love for Shweta and his duty as a soldier.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Bad Boy
programme.desc: When a good-for-nothing Raghu falls in love with the studious Ritu, it feels like a recipe for disaster. Especially, as Ritu's family is against their relationship. How will the lovers unite?

programme.title: Kites
programme.desc: Ayananka Bose won an award for the 'Best Cinematography' at the Zee Cine Awards 2011.

programme.title: Thanedaar
programme.desc: (1990) Brijesh (Sanjay Dutt) impersonates inspector Avinash (Jeetendra) not realising that it is his estranged brother. They unite to settle old scores with Thakur (Kiran Kumar).

programme.title: Freaky Ali
programme.sub-title: A debt collector becomes a golfing sensation. Stars
programme.desc: Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Arbaz Khan, Amy Jackson. 2016.

programme.title: Half Girlfriend
programme.desc: Madhav meets a girl named Riya and falls in love. After struggling to convince her to be his girlfriend, she halfheartedly agrees to be his 'Half Girlfriend'.

programme.desc: (Movie @6) A 1988 release film is about three close friends. Two of them end up becoming enemies after some truths are revealed. Starring Mithun Chakraborty, Sanjay Dutt and Govinda.

programme.title: Dabangg 3
programme.desc: Saiee Manjrekar won the 'Highest Grossing Debut Actress' award and Prabhu Deva won the 'The 100 Crore Club' award at the ETC Bollywood Business Awards 2020.

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: Karan Khanna, a politician of Indian origin in the United Kingdom, who is accused of killing his wife. He tells his lawyer that a spirit committed the murder and should be tried.

programme.desc: A lonesome florist with a new-found love interest and a psychopath killer who targets film critics in Mumbai. Are the two related? Inspector Arvind Mathur and Dr. Zenobia are about to find out.

programme.title: Trishul
programme.desc: The film was declared a 'Super Hit' at the box office, becoming the second-top-grossing Indian film of 1978.

programme.title: Kranti
programme.desc: (1981) Kranti is the story of India's freedom struggle against the British. Of two brave men who formed bands of revolutionaries to fight for an Independent India.

programme.title: Khoobsurat
programme.desc: Fawad Khan won 'Best Debut Actor' award at the Filmfare Awards 2015 and Sonam Kapoor won 'Best Actress in a Comedy or Romance' award at the Stardust Awards, India 2014.

programme.title: Saaransh
programme.desc: Anupam Kher won the 'Best Actor' and Mahesh Bhatt won the 'Best Story' award at the Filmfare Awards 1985. Vasant Dev won the 'Best Lyrics' award at the 32nd National Film Awards.

programme.title: Siya
programme.desc: (UK TV Premiere) Siya, a 17yr-old rape survivor, decides to go against all odds & fight for justice after being held captive & repeatedly abused by a group of men. Can she defeat the perpetrators?

programme.title: Tere Naam
programme.desc: Himesh Reshammiya won the 'Best Music Director' award at the Zee Cine Awards 2004 and Screen Awards 2004. Bhoomika Chawla won the 'Best Debut Actress' at the Best Debut Actress.

programme.title: Dil Dhadakne Do
programme.desc: Anil Kapoor and Shefali Shah won 'Best Supporting Role' award at the Stardust Awards 2016. Ranveer Singh won 'Most Entertaining Actor' at the Big Star Entertainment Awards 2015.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Aap Ke Deewane
programme.desc: Ram and Rahim disguise themselves as an aged couple and tutor a wealthy young girl, Sameera. The two fall in love with her, but Sameera must choose one of them.

programme.title: Jodi No 1
programme.desc: Partners in crime Jai and Veeru set their next target on a rich businessman, Rai Bahadur. Things turn hilarious when both of them fall for his daughters.

programme.title: Hello Charlie
programme.desc: Charlie, a young man, is tasked with transporting a gorilla to Diu, unaware that it is a fraudster in a costume. Chaos erupts after Charlie encounters a real gorilla on their journey.

programme.title: Ek Hi Bhool
programme.desc: (1981) A moment of passion between Ram (Jeetendra) and his wife's good friend ends his marriage with Sadhna (Rekha). They meet years later. Will their son bring them together?

programme.title: Pyaasa Sawan
programme.desc: (1981) Ravi finds himself meeting the same family situations as his father, Chandrakanth, when he is unable to give time to his wife, Manorama.

programme.title: Zamane Ko Dikhana Hai
programme.desc: (Movie @6) Kanchan (Padmini Kolhapure) falls for Ravi (Rishi Kapoor), but is unaware that he's also the son of the man who had killed her sister and brother-in-law. A 1981 love story.

programme.title: Genius
programme.desc: An orphan joins Raw, the foreign intelligence agency of India. During a mission, all of his comrades die and he decides to seek revenge to find peace in his life.

programme.title: Sarkar 3
programme.desc: Gandhi seeks Sarkar's help to evict the slum dwellers. When Sarkar asks for compensation, Gandhi refuses and goes to an oppostion leader. But Sarkar won't let Gandhi succeed.

programme.title: Singhasan
programme.desc: The kingdoms of Avanti and Gandharva are plagued by enemies with vested interests. But chief commander of Gandharva, Vikram Singh, is a brave warrior who aims to outsmart one and all.

programme.title: Satyagraha
programme.desc: A corporate go-getter sees his priorities shift when a personal tragedy brings him face to face with political corruption. Starring Kareena Kapoor, Amitabh Bachchan and Ajay Devgn.

programme.title: Jeete Hai Shaan Se
programme.desc: (1988) A film about three close friends. Two of them end up becoming enemies after some truths are revealed. Starring Mithun Chakraborty, Sanjay Dutt and Govinda.

programme.title: Qayamat Se Qayamat Tak
programme.desc: The film won several award including, 'Best Film, Best Director, Best Music, Best Singer - Male, Best Debut Actor - Male, Best Cinematographer' at the Filmfare Awards 1989.

programme.title: A Flying Jatt
programme.desc: Aman (Tiger), a meek youngster who is scared of heights, discovers his superpowers when he is forced to face the evil Raka, who is sent by an industrialist to destroy humanity.

programme.title: Housefull
programme.desc: (Movie @6) Riteish Deshmukh won the 'Best Comic Actor' award at the Awards of the International Indian Film Academy'11. Akshay Kumar won the 'Stardust - Star of the Year' award in 2011.

programme.title: Thank God
programme.desc: An egotistical real estate broker comes face-to-face with God after meeting with an accident. Soon, he is forced to play a game that will put him either in heaven or hell.

programme.title: Haseena Maan Jaayegi
programme.desc: (1999) Separated from their wealthy father and each other, two brothers (Sanjay Dutt, Govinda) try to win the hearts of their dream girls. Starring Sanjay Dutt and Govinda.

programme.title: Jazbaa
programme.desc: (2015) Anuradha, an honest lawyer & single mother, finds herself in a do-or-die situation when her daughter Sanaya is kidnapped. Aishwarya Rai got an award for 'Power-Packed Performance of the Year'.

programme.title: Aaj Ka Arjun
programme.sub-title: A 1990 release. Bhima is out to seek revenge for his sister's death and for the atrocities committed by the Thakurs'. St
programme.desc: Amitabh Bachchan, Jayapradha, Radhika Sarathkumar.

programme.title: Dharam Karam
programme.desc: (1975) Drama about estranged fathers and sons that proves the superiority of nature over nurture! Raj Kapoor and Randhir Kapoor play the father and son. Good music by R. D. Burman!

programme.title: Gopichand Jasoos
programme.sub-title: A middle-aged private detective faces challenges when he accepts an assignment to trace stolen diamonds. Stars
programme.desc: Raj Kapoor, Zeenat Aman, I. S. Johar.

programme.title: The Hero: Love Story Of a Spy
programme.desc: Priyanka Chopra Jonas won 'Best Supporting Actress' award at the Stardust Awards, India 2004.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: (Movie @6) Vikram, a forest officer, is falsely accused of murdering his wife and is imprisoned. As he sets out to exact revenge after serving prison time, Neeta suspects him of murdering her father.

programme.title: Krrish 3
programme.desc: Krrish and his father must defeat human-animal mutants created by an evil genius, Kaal, who is hell-bent on destroying the world. His vile army is led by a chameleon mutant, Kaya.

programme.title: Teri Bhabhi Hai Pagle
programme.desc: Dev, an assistant director, dreams of independently directing a film and manages to convince Raj, a superstar, to produce his film. However, chaos ensues as the shooting commences.

programme.title: Paying Guests
programme.desc: 4 friends are looking for accommodation. They find a place but with one condition which is only couples. They are now in a fix and need to get fake wives soon to get accommodation.

programme.title: Lagaan
programme.desc: The film was praised and won several awards globally like, 'Movie of the Decade, Best Director, Best Actor in a Leading Role, Best Music Direction, Best Story'.

programme.title: Mera Dharam
programme.desc: (1986) A film about the enmity between two families and how the next generation can put an end to it. Starring Jackie Shroff, Amrita Singh and Shakti Kapoor.

programme.desc: Sridevi was declared best actress and Saroj Khan was declared best choreographer at the Filmfare Awards 1990.

programme.title: The Exorcist: Believer
programme.desc: Single parent Victor Fielding raises his daughter Angela, 13 years after the death of his pregnant wife in a Haitian earthquake. He is alarmed when Angela and her friend Katherine vanish in the woods and return three days later with no memory of their ordeal. A shocking chain of events convinces Victor that his daughter's soul is at stake and he calls upon Chris MacNeil to help him confront an ancient evil. programme.desc: Single parent Victor Fielding raises his daughter Angela, 13 years after the death of his pregnant wife in a Haitian earthquake. programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 26/12/12. The Reds welcomed Newcastle for a Boxing Day clash that could allow them to stretch their advantage at the top of the table.

programme.title: FAC: United v Chelsea 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 10/3/13. The Reds faced holders Chelsea in a heavyweight FA Cup clash.

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 26/12/12. Unfortunate Newcastle are pipped at the final hurdle in this gripping Boxing Day match at Old Trafford.

programme.title: PL: Southampton v United 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 2/9/12. Sir Alex's 1000th league game in charge of United saw them face a trip to the south coast to take on newly-promoted Southampton.

programme.title: PL: Man City v United 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 9/12/12. Relive this unforgettable Manchester derby as United travelled to the Etihad Stadium knowing victory would leave Sir Alex Ferguson's side in pole position in the title race.

programme.title: PL: Chelsea v United 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 28/10/12. United took on early pacesetters Chelsea in search of a first league win at Stamford Bridge in almost a decade.

programme.title: CL: Real Madrid v United 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 13/2/13. United faced a huge Champions League clash with Real Madrid, pitting Sir Alex's side against their former talisman Cristiano Ronaldo.

programme.title: PL: Liverpool v United 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 23/9/12. Always a special fixture, Sir Alex's side went to Anfield in search of their first win at the home of their fierce rivals since 2007.

programme.title: PL: United v Swansea 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 12/5/13 . United took on Swansea looking to bring down the curtain in style as Sir Alex took charge of his final home game as United boss.

programme.title: PL: West Brom v United 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 19/5/13. The last chapter of the Sir Alex Ferguson story, the Reds took on West Bromwich Albion in his 1500th and final game as manager.

programme.title: PL: Aston Villa v United 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 10/11/12. Villa Park has been a happy hunting ground for the Reds down the years, how would a new-look Aston Villa side under Paul Lambert fare against Sir Alex's men?

programme.title: PL: Chelsea v United 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 28/10/12. The Reds traveled to Stamford Bridge looking to derail the Blues flying start to the season and close the gap at the top of the Barclays Premier League.

programme.title: PL: United v Aston Villa 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 22/4/13. Defeat for Manchester City against Tottenham meant that a win would secure the Reds a historic 20th league title, could they see off Aston Villa?

programme.title: PL: United v Everton 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 10/2/13. Sir Alex's side welcomed Everton desperate to erase the memory of the previous season's 4-4 draw that effectively cost the Reds the Premier League title.

programme.title: PL: Sunderland v United 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 30/3/13. The Reds took on Sunderland at the Stadium of Light, the scene of the previous season's late heartbreak...
